author: The Hindu
title: The COVID-19 virus and its polyproteins
description: What makes up the virus and how drugs act on it
content: Everyday, we hear about the novel coronavirus, how it is easily infecting and transmitting itself from people to people, and how scientists and medical experts are waging a war against its spread. We also hear how different this is from bacteria, and why trea… [+6070 chars]
